beer.beer_description:
Gouden Carolus Classic, the ‘Grand Imperial Beer’ from Mechelen, is brewed with dark, very balanced dosed caramel and aromatic malts. This unique beer combines the warmth of wine and the freshness of beer. This makes it very suitable in combination with culinary specialties such as stews, pâtés, ripened or strong cheeses.

Elected Worlds’ Best Dark Beer (World Beer Awards 2012).

items.checkin_comment: Aroma is middel, sterk moutig, zoetig karamel?, smaak is middel, zacht, bitterig -dropachtig

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.checkin_comment: Une bonne Amber, ça faisait longtemps que je n’avais dégusté une rousse que j’aimais bcp moins. Elle me semble très sucrée, sûrement ce qui me plait moins dans cette gamme de bière. Pas la meilleur Carolus

items.badge_description: You don’t have to be a superhero to enjoy a strong beer. Boasting a higher than average ABV, these styles really do pack a punch, so be ready for it. That's 5 different beers with style of Strong Ale - American, Strong Ale - English, Strong Ale - Other, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Golden Ale or Lager - Strong. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 330 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 67!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 390 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 79!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 280 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 57!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 340 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 69!

You obviously are a big fan of Belgian Beer, and rightfully so! Three cheers to the great Belgian beers and their uniquely crafted flavors!

That's 145 different beers from Belgium. Try 5 more for Level 30.

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 95 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 20!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 475 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 96!

user.bio:
When I see an empty beer, my heart just sheds a tear.
Then I really have to think. If there's no beer, what do I drink?
